description:
The time has come for Nino to tell Jean everything. He begins the very long tale by going 33 years back into the past, with the royal family involved...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La princesse qui prit son envol, et le devoir d`un ami
The Princess Who Spread Her Wings and the Friend Who Had a Duty
Tsubasa o Hirogeta Oujo to Tomo no Tsutome
翼を広げた王女と友のつとめ
